skills.name: Throwing Axe
skills.description: Attacks with a flying axe and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 30% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%

Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +20%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Crushing Armor
skills.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases the enemy's Defense for 2 turns. The damage increases accordingly to your current HP situation.
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(3.5*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's current HP % in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Current HP %</mark> + 4.0)

skills.name: Marauder (Passive)
skills.description: Recovers HP by 30% of the inflicted damage also stealing one beneficial effect. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skill_effect.name: Steal Buff
skill_effect.description: Remove a beneficial effect and take it for yourself
